org.apache.juneau.rest

Interface RestInfoProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RestInfoProvider.Null
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RestInfoProviderDefault

    public interface RestInfoProvider
    REST resource information provider.

    Provides localized Swagger documentation and other related information about a REST resource.

    Additional Information
    • RestContext.REST_infoProvider

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  RestInfoProvider.Null
      Represents no RestInfoProvider.

    • Method Detail

      • getSwaggerFromFile

        Swagger getSwaggerFromFile(RestRequest req)
                    throws Exception
        Returns the contents of the localized swagger file for the specified request.
        Parameters:
        req - The incoming HTTP request.
        Returns:
        The contents of the parsed swagger file, or null if a swagger file could not be found.
        Throws:
        Exception - Throw a RestException with a specific HTTP error status or any other exception to cause a SC_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.

      • getSwagger

        Swagger getSwagger(RestRequest req)
            throws Exception
        Returns the localized swagger for the REST resource.

        If getSwaggerFromFile(RestRequest) returns a non-null value, then that swagger is returned by this method.
        Otherwise, a new swagger object is return with information gathered via the other methods defined on this class.

        Parameters:
        req - The incoming HTTP request.
        Returns:
        A new Swagger instance.
        Never null.
        Throws:
        Exception - Throw a RestException with a specific HTTP error status or any other exception to cause a SC_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.

      • getMethodOperationId

        String getMethodOperationId(Method method,
                            RestRequest req)
                     throws Exception
        Returns the localized operation ID of the specified java method.
        Parameters:
        method - The Java method annotated with @RestMethod.
        req - The current request.
        Returns:
        The localized operation ID of the method, or null if none was found.
        Throws:
        Exception - Throw a RestException with a specific HTTP error status or any other exception to cause a SC_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.

                 throws Exception
